prodNameC: "西門子" 德國麻疹病毒G試劑
ingredientsDesc:
Lite reagent: inactivated rubella virus antigen (strain HPV77) (~0.20μg/mL) labeled with acridinium ester in protein buffer with surfactant and preservatives
Solid phase: anti-human IgGFc monoclonal antibody (~0.15 mg/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in protein buffer with  preservatives
Calibrators: processed human plasma positive for rubella IgG antibodies with preservatives
Controls: processed human plasma negative and positive for rubella IgG antibodies with preservatives
applicantName: 西門子醫療設備股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 臺北市南港區園區街3號2樓之2
efficacy: 用於體外診斷，利用ADVIA Centaur 系統定量和定性檢測血清或血漿中的德國麻疹病毒免疫球蛋白G抗體。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學裝置
mdKind.mdKindDCodeName: C.3510 德國麻疹病毒血清試劑

factoryDtoList.factoryAddr: 333 CONEY ST. EAST WALPOLE, MA 02032, U.S.A.

ingredientsDtoList.ingredientsDesc:

Solid phase: anti-human IgGFc monoclonal antibody (~0.15 mg/mL) covalently coupled to paramagnetic particles in protein buffer with  preservatives

Controls: processed human plasma negative and positive for rubella IgG antibodies with preservatives
